Uses of Package
info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal

  • Packages that use info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal 
    Package Description
    info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.dao  
    info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities  
    info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal  
  • Classes in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal used by info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.dao 
    Class and Description
    FinishedGoal
    When a player has completed a Goal, it will be added to the player’s list of finished goals.
    Goal
    A Goal comprises one or more tasks and is associated with a goal rule.
    GoalRule
    With a Goalrule can be defined which tasks and if all or only one task have to be fulfilled to reach a goal and obtain the rewards for it.
    TaskRule
    A TaskRule defines the combination of tasks until a goal is fulfilled.
  • Classes in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal used by info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities 
    Class and Description
    FinishedGoal
    When a player has completed a Goal, it will be added to the player’s list of finished goals.
    Goal
    A Goal comprises one or more tasks and is associated with a goal rule.
  • Classes in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal used by info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal 
    Class and Description
    FinishedGoal
    When a player has completed a Goal, it will be added to the player’s list of finished goals.
    Goal
    A Goal comprises one or more tasks and is associated with a goal rule.
    GoalRule
    With a Goalrule can be defined which tasks and if all or only one task have to be fulfilled to reach a goal and obtain the rewards for it.
    TaskRule
    A TaskRule defines the combination of tasks until a goal is fulfilled.
